meanings.definition: Relating to or consisting of a cyclic compound containing only carbon atoms.
meanings.sent1: The chemist studied the carbocyclic structure of the molecule.
meanings.sent2: Organic chemistry often deals with carbocyclic compounds.
meanings.sent3: The carbocyclic molecule threw a carbon party, inviting only its carbon friends.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts formed a carbocyclic loop, endlessly circling back to the same idea.
meanings.sent5: The artist painted a vivid picture of the carbocyclic structure, capturing every carbon bond.

meanings.definition: A compound containing a ring of carbon atoms.
meanings.sent1: The scientist synthesized a new carbocyclic in the lab.
meanings.sent2: Carbocyclics are commonly found in natural products like steroids.
meanings.sent3: At the carbon carnival, the carbocyclic was the ringmaster, entertaining all the other atoms.
meanings.sent4: The city skyline resembled a carbocyclic, with each building representing a carbon atom in the ring.
meanings.sent5: In the world of molecules, the carbocyclic stood out like a shining ring of carbon.
